11222.content:
I didn't know what was going on. When I woke up and looked around, this clearly looked like a girl's room! I saw posters of guys and boy bands. I saw a vanity with makeup! Stuffed animals were on shelve and on my bed. My bed cover was a pink flower pattern. I sat up, wondering if I was a girl! My hands went over my body. I didn't have breasts, and my cock was still there! Okay? But I was dressed in a pink nightie and wearing white panties. When I got up, I saw myself in the mirror but dressed in girl's clothing!

Suddenly, my bedroom door opened! I was in shock! There was no way of hiding me standing here in girl clothing! My mom stuck her head in! "Oh good! I am glad to see that you are up Emma!" She stepped in, "I know that Matt is picking you up at 2, but I need your help before you leave. Get dressed and come down stairs so we can have some breakfast and get started!" Then she left the room!

I was stunned! Not only did she see nothing wrong with me, she thought that I was a girl! Or did she? Maybe boys wear girl clothing in this world? Well, either way, I guessed that I would find out in time. For now, I needed to get ready. When I went into the bathroom, I didn't care about what others thought I was, I peed standing up! I showered using girly shampoo that made my hair smell pretty. When I was all done in the bathroom, I headed back to my room. I realized that I didn't have a comb, so I had to use a hair brush. I looked at the makeup a long time. It seemed to be mine of course, but did I really want to wear it? And if I didn't, would I stand out? Be considered odd? I decided to compromise and wear some, but not much. The funny thing was, I seemed to know what to do, even though I never wore makeup before in my life.

Getting dressed was different. Of course, all of the clothes were girl's clothing, and to my dismay, a majority of what would cover my lower half seemed to be skirts and dresses. I wasn't ready for that though, even if it was normal in this world, so I picked out some jeans and a top. The jean's were definitely girl cut, and the top was pink, but they seemed to be the least girly things I now owned! I did run into one issue in particular though. When getting some underwear, which of course were all panties, I saw that I had a large selection of bras! I hesitated a long time, but the fact that there were so many told me that it must be something I normally wore every day. I didn't like it, but I opted not to take chances, and with less trouble than I expected, I put one on. The fact that it was easy for me to do, like the makeup, somewhat confirmed that I was right. I normally did wear bras.

I went down stairs, and as soon as we finished breakfast, my mom said, "Okay honey. You take care of the dishes, and when you are done, clean the upstairs bathroom. You should be done in plenty of time to make yourself pretty for Matt before he comes. I hope it is a good movie that you go to!"

Make myself pretty for a guy!?!? Did I have a boyfriend in this world? Not really being a girl, that could make things awkward for me, of course, again, unless it was normal in this world. This was so confusing!

Either way, I did what I considered my 'girl chores', and then took another shower. Cleaning the toilet was yucky! Yucky? Where did that come from? I cleaned up, and brushed my short hair, and for some reason, I went all out with the makeup. If I were taking a girl to the movies, I would expect her to look nice, so I braced myself and picked out a nice skirt and top. Nothing fancy, but much more feminine than I would have liked. I had just finished when the doorbell rang, and sure enough, my mom called up the step that Matt was there. I didn't even know who this guy was yet. For that matter, I didn't know if I was his girlfriend or if this was our first date! Well, there was only one way to find out, I went down the steps.
11222.title: Your gonna become a girl

112222.content:
When I got down the stairs, I was stunned! It was Matt Harris! He had been my worst nightmare since the fourth grade! He was as big and strong looking in this world as he was in the one that I came from! And I couldn't help noticing that he had a slight bulge in his crotch, so it didn't seem like he was a girl dressed as a guy. And he was tall!

I guess my hesitation came off as shyness because my mom stepped in, "Now, you understand the rules? She needs to be back by 9pm. No excuses for being late, or the two of you won't have a second date. Understood?"

It was a little funny to see Matt the bully being put in place by my mom! He answered, "Yes ma'am." A bit sheepishly. Then he looked at me with a smile, "You look great Emma! Are you ready to go?" He held out his hand.

Okay, this was too weird! But I didn't have much choice until I had a better idea of where this life was taking me. I hesitated, then took his hand, "Ready!" I tried to sound like I was happy about it. He walked me to a local restaurant, holding my hand the whole time. Something felt like it was changing in me the whole time I was in contact with Matt, but I couldn't figure out what.

When we got to the restaurant, I saw my reflection in the one window and got a bit of a shock. What I saw was....
112222.title: Oh no! It is the Matt who was your worst enemy!

choices: Give in and let him kiss you
Tell Matt that you need to go to the bathroom
1122222.content:
Was it even possible? How? I tried not to show it, but I glanced down at my chest. It only took a small glance to see that my chest was more puffy than before! Not really breasts yet. More like a young girl who was just starting to get them, but it was also more than any normal male would have, and more than I had this morning! Now I was really glad that I had worn a bra!

There were other things too. Here I was with Matt, a guy who I should be hating right now, but I didn't. In fact, I liked his attention, and, well, I was enjoying being with him. Not that he wasn't picking on me, I found that he had a great sense of humor! Before the food came, and after, he seemed to really like holding my hand, and I didn't mind. However, I did notice that the changes in me seemed to happen a little faster when I was in physical contact with him. The feelings didn't go away when he didn't though. By the time we were done eating, I noticed two things. I could now feel the weight of my breasts, which were now undeniable. Also, I felt a tickle on my neck, and sure enough, When I saw my reflection in another window, I could see that my hair had grown much longer than it had been!

I enjoyed the time with Matt, but now I was getting scared as we walked toward the theater. I was scared because of the thought of what was happening to me, and also because I knew what I would be doing with a girl in the theater on a date, and it wasn't watching the movie! Matt bought our tickets, and I almost thought that Matt seemed as nervous as I felt. Sure enough, Matt led the way to the back row. He only held my hand until the lights went low, an the moment that I was dreading was fast approaching. He let go of my had and put an arm around my shoulder. Soon, he was pulling me close. I knew what he wanted, but I was still a male where it counted. How could I kiss 'another' guy. There was another part of me though. A part that liked what I was feeling. A part that wanted to kiss Matt! What to do!?!?
1122222.title: I was growing breasts

113.content:
You chose the bubble on your right and suddenly wake up. You aren't in your room; you're in a large, opulent room with all manner of expensive things you had always wanted, but could never afford. You wondered how you got there when the door opened to reveal your neighbor. However, he was dressed in a butler's uniform.

"Master Jake," he called you, "Your breakfast is ready in the dining room. You'd better hurry up, sir, or you will be late for class. I can't speed in a limousine."

Master Jake? you thought to yourself. Why was your neighbor acting as though you were rich and he served you? Then you remembered what the voice had said. This must be your second life! In this dimension, you were rich!

Jumping out of bed with joy, you find your closet filled with the latest fashions. Throwing on the coolest clothes you have ever seen, you run downstairs and find the dining room. Even though you have never been here before, you know exactly how the mansion is set up. Finishing a full-course meal as quickly as a bowl of cereal due to your excitement, you rush out to the limo and your neighbor-turned-servant drives you to the University for your first class.
113.title: Your Second Life

115.content:
Suddenly Jake shot up in bed in the dark. Everything suddenly smelled old and weird. Blankets surrounding you feel bulky, and rough. You go to move them, but they hit something, so you feel it and go it's a metal safety bar attached to your bed, confused even more you start to get up. But then I light turns on, in seconds you take in this rooms muted, and faded colors, the walls were a cream tone that matched bedding of a queen sides bed next to your own. The lamp even has faded likes on it. For a second you aren't sure, but the hand working the lamp looks wrinkly and thin.

In fact in the queen-sized bed she's a small old woman in a nightgown and hat, her elderly husband, with hair both Gary and missing slowly sits up.
"Huh? What's wrong dear?" He asks his wife.
"Sorry just checking on Jakey. Are you alright sweetheart?" She asks as she comes out of bed and comes towards you. Confused, all you mutter out is "okay..." But she dosen't seem to take your word for it. She pulls back your blankets and you see you are wearing nothing but an old boy's nightgown with strips. She lifts it up though and even your surpised to see yourself wearing a cloth diaper.

In this world you are the youngest, if only, son of some very old parents. Who dot on and care for you, with a weak body and small brain- mama had to be almost 50 when she had you, if not somehow older.
115.title: Coose what you want!

12.content:
Emily sighed.

"I would love to live something like this* She said closing her eyes imagining herself as the heroine of the book she just finished. "Marco!" She sighed hugging her pillow laying on the bed.

Emily was an average girl with an average life. She never complain of her life, but sometimes she just felt a little bored. Most of her time was spent at the school and her little free time between friends and her books. Nothing really change.

She walked to her boudoir and observed herself in the mirror. She was cute whit her long, curly brunet hair. She wore a little pair of glasses that frame her kindly honey eyes. She was curious of what would be of her with a different kind of life. What kind of adventures, mysteries, and romances she might live. Romances, eh? She pressed her finger on her strawberry lips and then on the mirrored image of them.

Emily closed her eyes and sighed again. What was she thinking? She look the mirror again and got surprised noticing that her reflection wasn't a mirrored image of her.

"Do you really want experience the adventures of which you have read of?" The mirrored Emily asked from behind the glass smiling.

The girl didn't know what to say. She gulped. What was occurring there? Was she dreaming? What?

Emily was silently nervous looking at her reflection which was smiling her waiting for her answer.

The girl breathed deeply and gained courage to answer honestly. "Yes, I do really want to have my own adventure." Said as firmly as her fear let her.

Her reflection giggled. "Then, when you wake up tomorrow, your wish will be granted."

"Just like that?"

"Yes." The image confirmed. "But I warning you that it will be just a glimpse. And when it ends it would be as if it had been just a dream." She smiled.

"Not exactly, but nearly." The mirror Emily giggled. "So what kind of adventure would you like to live?"
12.title: Emily

info.brief_description: You got the power to escape from your life into your life in another dimension.
info.description:
Some people on this planet have the luck to get a second life in another dimension. When they sleep they can choose in which dimension they want to go. One day you got this incredible power. The other dimension is just like our known real dimension but you will have a new family, new town to life in and of course a new body.

Please just follow this storyline and don't kill the main character in the real or the other dimension. Remember that all the people in the second dimension have another life in the real dimension too.

At least write what goes along with the story and your way of life.
(the real or the second one ^^)
